1.heading: Avenging.
1.title: "The Ghost of Elmer Watson"
1.author: Jerry Siegel, script ; Bernard Baily, art
1.appears_in: 10 p. in More Fun Comics, no. 64 (Feb. 1941) ; reprinted in Golden Age Spectre Archives, v. 1.
notes: Summary (from GCD): Elmer Watson comes back to avenge his own death, something the Spectre should appreciate, but doesn't.
Data from Gene Reed, Lou Mougin, Pat Lang & Bob Hughes via the Grand Comics Database Project.

3.heading: Avenging Deaths.
3.title: "Den II"
3.author: by Richard Corben
3.appears_in: p. 19-24 in Heavy Metal, v. 6, no. 6 (Sept. 1982).
notes: "In our last issue, Den, who was living with the Lorung tribe, learned that Zeg was dead, Tarn had run away, and that Zegium was destroyed. Den left to search for Tran and avenge Zeg's death."

4.heading: Avenging Deaths.
4.title: "Rex Tyler, Lawman of the Rockies" 8 p. in Top Adventure Comics, no. 2
4.author: [No author]
notes: "Introductory: Rex Tyler, young rover of the Canadian Rockies, having lost both his mother and father at the hand of a cruel and very greedy outlaw, swore to devote his time mostly to avenging their deaths by being a constant menace to the vast forces of outlawry, still alive to this very day."

185.author: Antonio Lara
notes: El Cubri is a political and creative group formed by writer Felipe Hernández and artist Saturio Alonso, and including artist Pedro Arjona. The article includes a 6-page story by El Cubri: "Aventuras en el Pais de las Maravillas."

188.heading: Aventuras Extraordinarias.
188.title: Aventuras.
188.author: [No author]
188.library has: no. 141, 227 (1961-1963). 1. Adventure story comics. 2. Horror comic books, strips, etc. 3. Western comic books, strips, etc. 4. Mexican comics. I. Aventuras Extraordinarias. II. Aventuras Vaqueros Intrepidos. III. Editora Sol. Call no.
notes: Description based on num. 141 (27 de Enero de 1961) = Vaq. Int. 35.
Translations of U.S. comic book stories; special genre subseries have separate numbering, e.g. no. 227 is also Aventuras Extraordinarias, no. 12 (horror issue)
